plot: The film tells the story of 3 brothers who made the difference in Brazilian history. They were hemophiliacs and got AIDS through blood transfusion. Their lives were dedicated to the fight ...
title: Três Irmãos de Sangue
plot_es: The film tells the story of 3 brothers who made the difference in Brazilian history. They were hemophiliacs and got AIDS through blood transfusion. Their lives were dedicated to the fight ...
